message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a fantastic deal considering its value to you. I'm confident this price is fair and mutually beneficial. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'd like to see some more flexibility on the price.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer and understand your position.  While I value your interest and recognize the product's worth to you, $900,000 is still a bit below what I'm looking for.  To show my willingness to work with you, I'm willing to come down to $950,000.  This would still be a great deal for you and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $925,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
